b3011812-bfcb-4de9-9e19-2c23833e06be.endStepEffect: If the enemy suffered 1 or more Wds during this round of Melee then it must discard 1 energy, if able.

5817602c-676e-44c6-9d9b-129b395304b1.name: Can't Hit Me!
5817602c-676e-44c6-9d9b-129b395304b1.extraText: Your opponent's attack deals ∅ damage to you this round.

4445205e-3fcf-431f-b284-6d55b74fc8cc.name: Threats & Promises
4445205e-3fcf-431f-b284-6d55b74fc8cc.endStepEffect: The enemy character gains 3 energy and may not target this model with an action for the remainder of the turn. This effect takes place even if the enemy is outside this character's Melee Range.

854f99c4-86cd-4e20-9ea5-d048c8fc0958.name: Needlepoint
854f99c4-86cd-4e20-9ea5-d048c8fc0958.extraText: Damage from this attack cannot be reduced by passive abilities.

72388572-fbff-42ac-91ed-d8955e6ea3e7.extraText: This attack deals +1 Dmg to Goblins. Reduce all Dmg suffered from Goblins to ∅.

4fdefee5-573a-423a-a21f-b04c22d0cd04.name: Play Dead
4fdefee5-573a-423a-a21f-b04c22d0cd04.endStepEffect: Enemy characters cannot target this model with actions until this model next performs an action or the end of turn, whichever comes first.

42827c15-9aa0-4694-8214-d00089e1f62f.endStepEffect: If this character was not slain it may take possession of up to one Moonstone carried by the enemy. The enemy character may spend 1 energy to cancel this effect. If they do, this model gains 1 energy.

3a049366-1f6a-43a0-a22c-4506d832b437.name: Groin Tickler
3a049366-1f6a-43a0-a22c-4506d832b437.extraText: Damage from this attack cannot be reduced by passive abilities.
3a049366-1f6a-43a0-a22c-4506d832b437.endStepEffect: You may place this model anywhere in base contact with the enemy model.

16557732-3bb4-4bbf-b277-e1b7704384e7.name: Impale

6da7d0a3-af72-4cc9-ad3e-3e2a1e1f4593.name: Shield Bash

27dcf4e1-0b85-48e5-a52a-f32786ada094.name: Cockatrice Companion
27dcf4e1-0b85-48e5-a52a-f32786ada094.description: When targeting an enemy character that has no energy with a Melee Attack or Petrifying Gaze action, increase any Dmg dealt by +1.

e1996e84-d953-4e94-98f0-023d718b1fe3.name: Have You Tried Turning it Off and On Again?

a3b4c5d6-e7f8-4901-a3b4-c5d6e7f89012.name: Bingy
a3b4c5d6-e7f8-4901-a3b4-c5d6e7f89012.description: When making a Reaction Step whilst engaged by an enemy, this model may spend (0) energy instead of (1). Once per turn.

47cdddf7-5632-40ec-918a-d9c89a572d2c.name: Claws and Stick
47cdddf7-5632-40ec-918a-d9c89a572d2c.description: : If this character deals Slicing or Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

fff45886-35f7-4a7d-921d-9e36c3dca935.description: When this model causes 1 or more Wds to an enemy in a round of melee, it may summon a new friendly Psychopomp as a bonus End Step Effect. Place the new friendly Psychopomp in base contact with this model. This cannot bring a character into play if it is already in play. If the enemy is slain this character may instead reduce the energy cost of the next Arcane Ability it uses this turn to (0).

89c6ec45-98e2-44f6-9f8c-600ddb2369a9.name: Lance

7324a1a1-31bd-44de-af1a-e7b93457a0da.name: Digger
7324a1a1-31bd-44de-af1a-e7b93457a0da.description: When this model takes a Harvest action on a Moonstone, flip an Arcane Card and reduce the Depth Value by X, where X is the value of the card.

8a1db3fa-32f7-4d63-b562-e931fc084383.name: Jousting Shield
8a1db3fa-32f7-4d63-b562-e931fc084383.description: Reduce Piercing and Impact Dmg suffered by -1.

d76bc18c-4ff3-4105-bac4-7ac0c5a9a003.name: Shifter

c7cf5161-3cc3-42ae-87ff-e8db8456922b.name: Enchanted Javelin

b5ca7995-9ec2-45c9-8b66-2593c1819e50.description: If this character would suffer Dmg, you may reduce that Dmg to ∅.

a91c76a2-8146-442f-bac9-bca964c19408.description: This character may Jog over Wooded Patches and gains +1 energy during the Replenish Step if any part of its base is within a Wooded Patch.

eeb128d8-8cdc-4ccb-9735-5e3807dbfc94.name: Leather Jerkin

6e1bc930-ace9-4f8a-94f8-ce673ced08a8.description: This model's Jog actions are limited to 2".

18272865-cf41-40bc-ae76-5377dfe6f2f5.name: Ramshackle Armour
18272865-cf41-40bc-ae76-5377dfe6f2f5.description: Reduce all non-Magical Dmg suffered by -1.

0e006a76-2e1a-4bec-86ff-f7ace8a61dd4.description: During a round of combat, before each player selects their combat card, you must reveal your hand to your opponent.

23a1c8cc-c7de-43e0-a0bb-56a84ee093e8.name: Forbidden Tome
23a1c8cc-c7de-43e0-a0bb-56a84ee093e8.description: The character that summoned this model gains +1 Arcane Stat while within 2" of this model.

3c796dfa-fce6-46d2-a514-7d7a9a87db91.name: Dagger
3c796dfa-fce6-46d2-a514-7d7a9a87db91.description: If this character deals Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

f323d844-6686-43b3-b4dd-343d8721d03f.name: Bludgeon
f323d844-6686-43b3-b4dd-343d8721d03f.description: If this character deals Slicing or Piercing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

37c65360-a4c6-4a2b-a89b-cb286d81c7a5.name: Rub It Better
37c65360-a4c6-4a2b-a89b-cb286d81c7a5.description: When this model causes 1 or more Wds to an enemy, a friendly Human or Cleric within 4" of this model may restore 1 Wd.

3564b4f1-f504-49d8-b9e6-245636571167.name: Divine Intervention
3564b4f1-f504-49d8-b9e6-245636571167.description: When an enemy targets this character with an Arcane Ability, or uses an Arcane Ability within 4" of this model, if your resist hand includes two or more Catastrophe cards, you may reveal them to cancel the ability and inflict the catastrophe result on the active character.

277bb057-3414-4870-8633-6adad4901a5d.name: Great Sword
277bb057-3414-4870-8633-6adad4901a5d.description: : If this character deals Slicing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +3. If this character deals Impact or Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

844b7b4e-e351-458a-82b4-08ebb3732cd9.name: Gnarled Staff
844b7b4e-e351-458a-82b4-08ebb3732cd9.description: If this character deals Slicing or Piercing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg dealt to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

f7c47a5f-98db-49fe-aca3-e05fc9df9235.name: Up, Up & Away
f7c47a5f-98db-49fe-aca3-e05fc9df9235.description: This character may move freely over all terrain and other models during Jog and Step actions, provided it does not end the move with the base overlapping another model or barrier terrain. It cannot take the Harvest action or the Melee Attack action, cannot be targeted by Melee Attack actions and does not engage enemy models or become engaged by enemy models. It does not block LoS, provide Cover, gain bonuses for elevation, or suffer from Falling. When targeted by Arcane actions, this character does not benefit from Cover.

70a5562d-d0fe-4e53-a595-e0118ea6638e.name: Brute Strength
70a5562d-d0fe-4e53-a595-e0118ea6638e.description: Increase all Melee Dmg dealt by +2.

1f89a2eb-add5-4b1d-8619-1210173a48fa.name: Sage Advice
1f89a2eb-add5-4b1d-8619-1210173a48fa.description: Friendly models within 4" may ignore Catastrophe effects.

500d987a-ae88-48d4-813f-e6055ba029b4.name: Tough as Old Boots
500d987a-ae88-48d4-813f-e6055ba029b4.description: At the start of the Replenish Step this model recovers 2 Wds.

75a0643d-d2f7-4225-9c31-5ece5294ff53.name: Smell a Lie
75a0643d-d2f7-4225-9c31-5ece5294ff53.description: Enemy models targeting this model, or a model within 2", must reveal the arcane card as it is played.

bcce5eaf-b42c-4588-a733-01860da4339a.name: Enchanted Secateurs
bcce5eaf-b42c-4588-a733-01860da4339a.description: All Melee damage generated by this model count as Magical instead of the listed type.

b747d758-9fe9-4c59-8636-6f365d827363.name: Woodfoot
b747d758-9fe9-4c59-8636-6f365d827363.description: This character may jog over Wooded Patches.

957dcbc0-c6fc-45d9-b339-462a89c1605b.name: Ponderous
957dcbc0-c6fc-45d9-b339-462a89c1605b.description: This character cannot take Reaction Steps.

6519f7a6-a11e-4c45-9503-4288db313a86.name: Knotted Branches
6519f7a6-a11e-4c45-9503-4288db313a86.description: If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

f1110fd9-0416-4f3a-9dfc-d5cb5098b307.name: Bark Skin
f1110fd9-0416-4f3a-9dfc-d5cb5098b307.description: If this character suffers Piercing or Slicing Dmg, reduce the Dmg suffered by -1.

84dc5ec4-7fe2-42c4-b296-587c6d5191db.name: Forest
84dc5ec4-7fe2-42c4-b296-587c6d5191db.description: After this character suffers Dmg, it may restore 1 Wd for each Wooded Patch within 4".

14ae09d4-db4a-4dec-80bc-46d309daf22f.name: Evolution [Grub]
14ae09d4-db4a-4dec-80bc-46d309daf22f.description: This character cannot be taken into a Troupe containing the named character or vice versa.

cc2694f2-1251-4862-a4af-c281052e4b82.name: Guerilla Tactician
cc2694f2-1251-4862-a4af-c281052e4b82.description: Other friendly Fauns within 6" gain +1 Melee Stat and [Swift: When making a Reaction Step while engaged by an enemy, this model may move 2" instead of the usual 1". Once per turn.].

f4363198-4bef-4c7c-8579-53ae91f6460a.name: Felling Axe
f4363198-4bef-4c7c-8579-53ae91f6460a.description: If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

73c7e74a-9eb2-48fe-a254-22c3943aa05a.name: Strength from Beyond
73c7e74a-9eb2-48fe-a254-22c3943aa05a.description: If at least one friendly model was slain this turn, this character gains +2 Arcane Stat until end of turn.

017a2b63-2570-4cd9-a3d6-c795803a17f7.name: Storm of Fae Blades
017a2b63-2570-4cd9-a3d6-c795803a17f7.description: If this character deals Slicing or Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

944fa8d3-0bd0-4587-b9ce-36761a7ef2b9.name: Dance in Concert
944fa8d3-0bd0-4587-b9ce-36761a7ef2b9.description: When another friendly Faerie within 6" makes a Reaction Step whilst engaged by an enemy model, this character may spend the energy instead of the Faerie performing the Reaction Step.

eaeb8f63-aa7b-4caa-98d9-01ff50aa0cf1.name: Perfect Form
eaeb8f63-aa7b-4caa-98d9-01ff50aa0cf1.description: After a friendly Faerie within 6" reveals a Melee Card, it may discard 1 energy then swap the revealed card with a Melee Card in hand.

0a0990d4-29f6-40f7-bcb2-2d55be81dce8.name: Razor Sharp Antlers
0a0990d4-29f6-40f7-bcb2-2d55be81dce8.description: If this character deals Piercing Melee Dmg increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

2a68d0a0-8c94-47fe-803a-9c334971bfe6.name: Hippity
2a68d0a0-8c94-47fe-803a-9c334971bfe6.description: You may move freely over intervening obstacles and models during Jog actions provided bases do not overlap at the end of the move.

6f4cc2d5-5a74-4df1-918f-fdc3946115a3.name: Waterfoot
6f4cc2d5-5a74-4df1-918f-fdc3946115a3.description: This character may Jog freely over Water Features.

fcef5720-87ab-479e-af5e-ed8e58279aa0.name: Stage Roll
fcef5720-87ab-479e-af5e-ed8e58279aa0.description: When an enemy targets this character with an Arcane Ability you may reveal any Red card from your resist hand before any cards are played. After resolving the current action, this model may move X" where X is the value of the revealed card.

e516661a-1e0b-47c1-8147-1ea47644209a.name: Summon Intermission Snacks
e516661a-1e0b-47c1-8147-1ea47644209a.description: When this model is deployed or enters play, you may place a new friendly Food Psychopomp in base contact. (If deployed, this must be in the deployment zone as normal. This cannot bring a character into play if it is already in play.).

f7c5b768-806f-415e-ab2b-647fd5f4d8c6.name: Glaive
f7c5b768-806f-415e-ab2b-647fd5f4d8c6.description: If this character deals Slicing or Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

61ec9a7d-2bf0-4fdd-8663-560c61cb3e6e.name: Älskling
61ec9a7d-2bf0-4fdd-8663-560c61cb3e6e.description: Reduce all Dmg this character would suffer by -1 for each other friendly Gnome or Animal within 4", to a maximum of -2.

6b5db097-917d-4585-963c-52d306e26ea5.name: The Bright Side of Death
6b5db097-917d-4585-963c-52d306e26ea5.description: Immediately after models have been deployed but before turn 1 begins, friendly characters with Reanimate gain [Reanimate Jobie (0): Place a friendly slain Jobie in base contact with this model. Restore all it's health. It gains +2 energy. It may activate this turn. A friendly Jobie may only enter play via Reanimate Jobie once per turn], until end of game.

492006dd-68a0-4d9a-bd4b-86a189ebc8f1.name: Joy of Entropy
492006dd-68a0-4d9a-bd4b-86a189ebc8f1.description: Whenever another character within 4" is slain, this character gains +1 energy.

89f2621f-0841-4316-b69f-f97c6e8af52a.name: Conductor
89f2621f-0841-4316-b69f-f97c6e8af52a.description: Other friendly Cultists and Spirits within 4" gain +1 Arcane Stat.

c83d4781-8de0-4a07-a3cc-88309b99e7e3.name: Flail
c83d4781-8de0-4a07-a3cc-88309b99e7e3.description: If this character deals Slicing or Piercing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg dealt to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg increase the Dmg dealt by +2. If this character plays a High Guard or Low Guard during Melee then it suffers 2 Wds during the End Step.

254a1100-00e3-4fd1-9539-6662c71fac8e.name: Egged-On
254a1100-00e3-4fd1-9539-6662c71fac8e.description: This character gains +1 Melee Stat for each other friendly Cultist within 6".

ab4b2321-1d9b-455b-aa4e-03941aab7d5d.name: Kinship [Raegan, Leshavult Priestess]
ab4b2321-1d9b-455b-aa4e-03941aab7d5d.description: If the friendly named character is within 6" during the Replenish Step, this character gains [Protection: The first time this character would suffer Dmg each turn, reduce that Dmg to ∅], until end of turn.

d35b6af8-9a2c-4e87-9e95-e3d2e5759368.name: Tubthumping
d35b6af8-9a2c-4e87-9e95-e3d2e5759368.description: The first time this game this character is reduced to 0 health boxes remaining, flip an Arcane Card. If the result is a Catastrophe, then this character is slain, otherwise it remains in play with X health boxes remaining, where X is the value on the flipped card.

5feab3ee-a7d9-4df8-9f86-f948c5eb805f.name: Recluse
5feab3ee-a7d9-4df8-9f86-f948c5eb805f.description: At the start of the Replenish Step this model gains +1 energy if there are no other models within 3".

3bd8d918-16f5-4d00-98e7-d25f5e8e46af.name: Old Staff
3bd8d918-16f5-4d00-98e7-d25f5e8e46af.description: If this character deals Piercing or Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

b6c676aa-c400-4117-8082-8f0ea3eabae3.name: Lampy's Light
b6c676aa-c400-4117-8082-8f0ea3eabae3.description: Enemy models within 3" get +1 Evade Stat.

9613167c-3f86-4a3c-b211-be575d080598.name: Manipulate the Runes
9613167c-3f86-4a3c-b211-be575d080598.description: After resolving an Arcane action this model initiated but before shuffling the Arcane Deck, you may set aside any cards from your hand that weren't played. After shuffling the Arcane Deck, put any number of the set aside cards on the top of the deck in any order and put the remainder on the bottom of the deck in any order.

45d78cda-a8c0-4277-b82a-544f2010ebef.name: Reading the Runes
45d78cda-a8c0-4277-b82a-544f2010ebef.description: When this character activates, you may guess a card (colour and number, or Catastrophe) then flip an Arcane Card. If you guessed correctly, apply the following effect: .

df61e757-cf3d-4dfc-8689-291678053e69.name: Hammer
df61e757-cf3d-4dfc-8689-291678053e69.description: If this character deals Piercing or Slicing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg dealt to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

9cd0c955-b3d5-41ca-91c6-71056e7fa13f.name: Favour of the Old Gods
9cd0c955-b3d5-41ca-91c6-71056e7fa13f.description: When this character suffers Dmg you may flip the top card of the Arcane Deck and reduce the Dmg suffered by -X where X is the value on the flipped card. Catastrophe reduces the Dmg suffered by 0.

44414ebc-a315-4bd2-9934-37d00e1ccaeb.name: Blind Faith
44414ebc-a315-4bd2-9934-37d00e1ccaeb.description: This character may not take Harvest or Jog actions unless there is a friendly model within 4".

88eabbde-63da-42a2-90e2-6574d20741e5.name: Censer Chain
88eabbde-63da-42a2-90e2-6574d20741e5.description: If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

67ff81c3-3a60-491f-b67b-9473bd376027.name: My Boys
67ff81c3-3a60-491f-b67b-9473bd376027.description: Reduce all Dmg this character would suffer by -1 for each other friendly Gnome within 4", to a maximum of -2.

f873df28-6428-4ebd-bbca-d9eba3a80440.name: Luck Charms
f873df28-6428-4ebd-bbca-d9eba3a80440.description: Other friendly Gnomes within 4" gain +1 Melee Stat and +1 Arcane Stat.

9b8f6ff6-ad4b-4cff-ad4d-87b6186ccd4d.name: Resonance
9b8f6ff6-ad4b-4cff-ad4d-87b6186ccd4d.description: Friendly Spirits within 8" have a resist hand of +2 cards when targeted by an enemy Arcane Ability.

4c2dcf20-3844-44b8-a275-f5810f51c89d.name: Slip through the Deadlands
4c2dcf20-3844-44b8-a275-f5810f51c89d.description: Friendly Spirits within 8" gain [Blink: When making a Step action, this model may be placed within 1" of itself instead of moving 1". Once per turn].

3be4ab8d-c728-4af9-b185-0d20f47f44b2.name: Incorporeal Form
3be4ab8d-c728-4af9-b185-0d20f47f44b2.description: When this character activates it may discard 1 energy. If it does, this character reduces all non-Magical Dmg suffered to ∅ and may move freely over models and terrain during Jog actions but cannot take Harvest actions, until end of turn.

fd828492-8412-4bb7-9f33-d6dfe8386a47.name: Eclipse
fd828492-8412-4bb7-9f33-d6dfe8386a47.description: When an enemy targets this character with an Arcane Ability you may reveal a Green 2 or Red 2 from your resist hand before any cards are played. If you do, this character reduces all Dmg suffered to ∅ whilst resolving the current action.

0ce58ecb-e249-4ba7-a130-ec3c57822dba.name: Miner
0ce58ecb-e249-4ba7-a130-ec3c57822dba.description: When this model makes a Harvest action, gain possession of the Moonstone regardless of its depth value. This model ignores the Slow Carry rule whilst in possession of exactly one moonstone.

1b34b9ef-b996-486b-ab52-485c822fae65.name: Pick
1b34b9ef-b996-486b-ab52-485c822fae65.description: If this character deals Slicing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg dealt to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

e0e2d56a-5b1a-4c26-8b0d-6f3f5eea0001.name: Thrall [Boris, the Bunny Summoner]
e0e2d56a-5b1a-4c26-8b0d-6f3f5eea0001.description: This character can only enter play when summoned by the named friendly character. It does not activate and can never gain energy. Instead, while the named friendly character is active, this character can take actions, including Jog, by discarding the required energy on the named friendly character. Reaction Steps and Go For It's can be taken in the same way.

e0e2d56a-5b1a-4c26-8b0d-6f3f5eea0002.name: Back in the Burrow
e0e2d56a-5b1a-4c26-8b0d-6f3f5eea0002.description: You can have up to 3 friendly Murder Bunny in play at a time; if a fourth is summoned you must choose one friendly Murder Bunny to be Removed from Play. If Boris the Bunny Summoner is Slain or Removed from Play then this character is immediately considered to be Slain.

e0e2d56a-5b1a-4c26-8b0d-6f3f5eea0004.name: Razor Incisors
e0e2d56a-5b1a-4c26-8b0d-6f3f5eea0004.description: If this character plays a Rising Attack, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

c4a803b4-e303-4657-8a3e-a35e1b62a66d.name: Flea Infested Pelt
c4a803b4-e303-4657-8a3e-a35e1b62a66d.description: Reduce Magical and Slicing Dmg suffered by -1.

72c75274-5d73-4b4c-a958-47ad5af51e10.name: Honour Amongst Thieves
72c75274-5d73-4b4c-a958-47ad5af51e10.description: Friendly Rogues within 6" gain +1 Arcane Stat.

dfa40b7b-1f39-4895-ab02-8f5ecdf06d7e.name: You Protect Me Like the Babe
dfa40b7b-1f39-4895-ab02-8f5ecdf06d7e.description: Reduce all Dmg this character would suffer by -1 for each friendly Babeling within 6".

85fd5fb1-8f25-437f-ba68-84dc93ca5790.name: Disappear in a Crowd
85fd5fb1-8f25-437f-ba68-84dc93ca5790.description: This character's Evade Stat is -[#], where [#] is the number of other models within 3", excluding the originator of the ability.

d3f0b88f-711d-42e5-9482-1d26c7181848.name: A Bone to Pick with You
d3f0b88f-711d-42e5-9482-1d26c7181848.description: Friendly Soldiers and Risen within 6" gain +1 Arcane Stat if targeting an enemy character that is not at full health and +1 Melee Stat if involved in a round of melee with an enemy character that is not at full health.

39c39308-76d2-4550-aaf2-8193bf5607b1.name: Seen It All Before
39c39308-76d2-4550-aaf2-8193bf5607b1.description: If this character is attacker or defender in a round of melee, before each player selects their combat card, your opponent must reveal their hand.

0470c290-ae4a-4a52-8c72-d86ec42d7c63.name: Valhalla!!
0470c290-ae4a-4a52-8c72-d86ec42d7c63.description: When another friendly Norse or a friendly Young Jack within 6" starts a Jog action, it may move +2", provided the move ends with the character engaging an enemy. (Models with Slow are still limited to 2" as normal).

edb32643-c1c3-4092-bacc-256170d31445.name: Treasure Map
edb32643-c1c3-4092-bacc-256170d31445.description: Immediately after models have been deployed but before turn 1 begins, you may have a friendly Pirate take a free bonus Jog action.

259e4161-e449-4877-b00e-2bd7f5b8ff39.name: I Want My Nanny!!
259e4161-e449-4877-b00e-2bd7f5b8ff39.description: When an enemy character declares this model as a target of an action, you may interupt the action to move this model 2" directly towards a friendly Nanny. If you do, the enemy must complete the action if possible and may not choose a new target.

a2dd26fb-551a-4272-b2b7-e3269ac76a3b.name: Asleep on the Job
a2dd26fb-551a-4272-b2b7-e3269ac76a3b.description: This model may not be chosen to be the player's first activation unless it is the only model which can activate. When this character activates it gets +1 Melee Stat and reduces it's Evade Stat by -1 until end of turn.

23ba18c4-66f2-4ede-b0d7-e1f4a80b4961.name: Halberd
23ba18c4-66f2-4ede-b0d7-e1f4a80b4961.description: If this character deals Piercing or Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

88e01495-24f8-4909-9adb-a1abdde9104a.name: Secret Stash
88e01495-24f8-4909-9adb-a1abdde9104a.description: This character cannot lose possession of a Moonstone due to an enemy model unless slain.

b66c0057-1747-4f75-b878-6ae1c195b488.name: Goblin City Guard
b66c0057-1747-4f75-b878-6ae1c195b488.description: If a Goblin in possession of a Moonstone within 4" and LoS suffers Dmg, you may have this character suffer all that Dmg instead.

10bee3f0-c426-49d3-926c-fd453d5fb200.name: Pirate Mascot
10bee3f0-c426-49d3-926c-fd453d5fb200.description: When another friendly Pirate within 8" makes a Melee Attack they may gain +2 Melee Stat for the action, or if they are targeted by an Arcane Ability, they may gain -1 Evade Stat for the action.

5bb7887f-3d3e-462b-9d49-22ca5295d23a.name: Agility
5bb7887f-3d3e-462b-9d49-22ca5295d23a.description: This character may move freely over Obstacles and Wooded Patches during Jog actions. Traverse actions cost this character 1 less energy.

cc1a4431-338d-4ee9-89f5-e2397baf1cf3.name: Premonition
cc1a4431-338d-4ee9-89f5-e2397baf1cf3.description: If an enemy character declares this model as a target of an action, you may interrupt the action to make a reaction step by discarding one energy. If you do, the enemy must complete the action if possible and may not choose a new target.

122f3a3b-ccf9-46e5-9187-6f4faf6cdc50.name: Dirk
122f3a3b-ccf9-46e5-9187-6f4faf6cdc50.description: If this character deals Slicing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

96a6d325-9026-4f51-aa69-73eb66162f1f.name: Expel
96a6d325-9026-4f51-aa69-73eb66162f1f.description: Whenever any character suffers a Catastrophe, after resolving the action, draw an Arcane card for each Catastrophe suffered. Look, then place it face down besides this character card. At any point you can add the removed card to your Arcane or Arcane Resist Hand. If you do then at the end of the action, or if this character is slain, shuffle the card back into the Arcane Deck. This character can hold a maximum number of cards at any time equal to the current turn number; if an additional card is drawn, choose a card to shuffle back into the Arcane Deck.

dcc9dfac-b539-4dd8-aa1c-7b02b2c194a0.name: Ironclad Knuckles
dcc9dfac-b539-4dd8-aa1c-7b02b2c194a0.description: If this character deals Piercing or Slicing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg dealt to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

5b97489b-5d64-4a55-90bd-11b00697873c.name: Summon the Choir
5b97489b-5d64-4a55-90bd-11b00697873c.description: When this model is deployed or enters play, you may place a new friendly Musician Psychopomp in base contact. If deployed, this must be in the deployment zone as normal. This cannot bring a character into play if it is already in play.

8e611ca1-9d30-4e0a-9dd6-14ee0776c2d2.name: Woodspirit
8e611ca1-9d30-4e0a-9dd6-14ee0776c2d2.description: This character may jog over Wooded Patches. Friendly Treefold within 12" ignore Wooded Patches and other friendly Treefolk for determining cover when using Arcane Abilities.

9d9e93fd-424d-4b30-907c-5c982a64ed4e.name: We are Ruwt
9d9e93fd-424d-4b30-907c-5c982a64ed4e.description: Each time this character would be slain, it may instead drop any Moonstones as if it were slain and restore half it's health rounding up if it can be placed within a Wooded Patch created earlier this game within 12". Then remove the Wooded Patch.

7505b734-eeb0-471b-91a3-715b1d7461f7.name: New Growth
7505b734-eeb0-471b-91a3-715b1d7461f7.description: When this character uses an Arcane Ability it may suffer 3 Wds instead of paying the energy cost. If this reduces it to 0 Wds the Arcane Ability is cancelled.

5d476b58-cfe2-4811-835c-af6a0af97821.name: Harpoon
5d476b58-cfe2-4811-835c-af6a0af97821.description: If this character deals Impact or Slicing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg dealt by -1. If this character deals Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

c8dfe1f4-b1e7-4192-b84f-9075a6d69865.name: Oceanic
c8dfe1f4-b1e7-4192-b84f-9075a6d69865.description: This model's Jog actions are limited to 2" but may be made freely over Water Features.

senara-summon-depths-0001.name: Summon from the Depths
senara-summon-depths-0001.description: When this model is deployed or enters play, you may place a new friendly Aquatic Psychopomp in base contact. If deployed, this must be in the deployment zone as normal. This cannot bring a character into play if it is already in play.

787f23d4-1f92-4329-ae88-ea8f21dcbecd.name: Pavise
787f23d4-1f92-4329-ae88-ea8f21dcbecd.description: Reduce all non-Melee Dmg suffered by -2.

ac7e5674-c84f-4c6e-afd3-372f85434301.name: A Skele-tonne of Bolts
ac7e5674-c84f-4c6e-afd3-372f85434301.description: When a friendly model is slain, this character may immediately use Ancient Crossbow without spending energy after the current action is resolved. This is done before models may take reaction steps.

bc3c3371-7de5-4b3d-ad53-c2a23fdde2bb.name: Warhammer
bc3c3371-7de5-4b3d-ad53-c2a23fdde2bb.description: If this character deals Slicing or Piercing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

470d5799-b4f2-418d-b6f0-7f4b87a3f513.name: Ornithophobia
470d5799-b4f2-418d-b6f0-7f4b87a3f513.description: Whenever a Goblin character ends a move engaged by this model, for the first time this turn, it must discard 1 energy, if able.

0bab79af-66b8-47d3-b4a1-173fa4e3a15a.name: The Governor
0bab79af-66b8-47d3-b4a1-173fa4e3a15a.description: Friendly Soldiers within 6" gain +1 Melee stat.

c952983e-cc9b-4611-898b-f7663f2738a9.name: Hunting Spear
c952983e-cc9b-4611-898b-f7663f2738a9.description: If this character deals Piercing or Slicing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1. If this character deals Melee Dmg against an Animal, increase the Dmg by +1.

3f5763a8-936e-4d5d-b418-c8b3b905c095.name: Sun Shield
3f5763a8-936e-4d5d-b418-c8b3b905c095.description: If this character suffers Impact or Magical Dmg, reduce the Dmg suffered by -1.

37a909a9-4fef-4b83-b892-dfd9ca7fb231.name: Windfoot
37a909a9-4fef-4b83-b892-dfd9ca7fb231.description: This character may jog over Wooded Patches.

36523fae-0952-4eb8-98ec-788c38cb2f62.name: Accursed
36523fae-0952-4eb8-98ec-788c38cb2f62.description: When an enemy targets this character with an arcane action you may reveal any Green card from your resist hand before any cards are played. After resolving the current action, the enemy model suffers X-1 Wds where X is the value of the revealed card.

9b617b6e-2a23-4571-8814-fe8e914066cb.name: Splintered Branches
9b617b6e-2a23-4571-8814-fe8e914066cb.description: If this character deals Impact or Piercing Melee dmg, increase the dmg dealt by +1.

42fec24b-b562-4b94-b1a4-0c33c10d24e0.name: Vengeance
42fec24b-b562-4b94-b1a4-0c33c10d24e0.description: If a friendly character is slain or reduced to 0 Wds, the fist time this model uses an Arcane Ability this turn it doesn't need to spend any energy.

9634a7d3-cbf6-4522-8898-9097fb0c1e53.name: Summoned Being
9634a7d3-cbf6-4522-8898-9097fb0c1e53.description: You cannot choose this character for your Troupe.

7158bd1d-41e5-4120-91e9-c966698cf80f.name: Supernatural Strength
7158bd1d-41e5-4120-91e9-c966698cf80f.description: Increase all Melee Dmg dealt by +2. Melee Dmg caused by this character counts as Magical instead of the listed type.

654e1c31-ce9c-49de-bcbc-10b26e65bedc.name: Blood Drinker
654e1c31-ce9c-49de-bcbc-10b26e65bedc.description: If an enemy is slain during a round of melee by this character, then this character gains +3 energy.

188cf768-b697-459f-b1c7-3edac156fc47.name: Buckler
188cf768-b697-459f-b1c7-3edac156fc47.description: Enemy characters cannot count Critical Hits against this character.

828f4289-2ee8-4ff0-a1b0-6217e8c41c23.name: Inferiority Complex
828f4289-2ee8-4ff0-a1b0-6217e8c41c23.description: If this character deals Melee Dmg to a Noble, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

58a15aaa-9f6c-475c-9dbe-0b0532742a7f.name: Luv'a da booty
58a15aaa-9f6c-475c-9dbe-0b0532742a7f.description: If a friendly Pirate makes a Melee Attack action while within 6" of this model, you may have them gain +1 energy for each Moonstone that this character is in possession of.

fa2d533f-0051-4676-84fe-d2a49dfe5efb.name: Poking Stick
fa2d533f-0051-4676-84fe-d2a49dfe5efb.description: If this character deals Slicing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg dealt to ∅.

7c328d29-a0c1-45b5-8323-0ffcf61efd0e.name: Arcane Reflection
7c328d29-a0c1-45b5-8323-0ffcf61efd0e.description: If an enemy player targets this model with a Arcane Ability, after energy is spent but before Arcane Cards are drawn, you may discard 3 energy to reverse the caster and target (i.e. you play their Arcane Ability targeting them).

ac9bf7bd-6f5e-4d46-81b2-fdd57be60a1f.name: Awake the Beast
ac9bf7bd-6f5e-4d46-81b2-fdd57be60a1f.description: The first time an enemy targets this character with a Melee Attack Action or an Arcane Action in a turn, this character restores 1 Wd and gains +2 energy.

56741d03-d310-4237-b0ba-c81d0dbc8923.name: Quite Terrifying
56741d03-d310-4237-b0ba-c81d0dbc8923.description: Whenever a non-Giant, non-Troll enemy character ends a move engaged by this model, for the first time this turn, it must discard 1 energy, if able.

489ee457-485c-44dc-929b-d3ada88a1fe7.name: Network of Spies
489ee457-485c-44dc-929b-d3ada88a1fe7.description: Gain +1 to your initiative roll each turn.

9bef543c-d3db-4393-afda-f247d0c60d51.name: Foreboding
9bef543c-d3db-4393-afda-f247d0c60d51.description: When an enemy targets this character with an action, the active enemy model must suffer 1 Wd or the action is cancelled. If the active enemy model is slain by this, the action is also cancelled.

3046ccb3-2d00-4a6a-adc4-735f53a91d69.name: Strength from Suffering
3046ccb3-2d00-4a6a-adc4-735f53a91d69.description: Whenever another character suffers Wds from a Catastrophe effect, this character restores that many Wds.

d6a08a3c-9d43-40a4-8913-f48252ce1c14.name: Needle
d6a08a3c-9d43-40a4-8913-f48252ce1c14.description: If this character deals Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

4a1f57e9-5f5b-480d-95fe-5b5df7d48745.name: Spiteful
4a1f57e9-5f5b-480d-95fe-5b5df7d48745.description: When this model causes 1 or more Wds to an enemy, it restores 1 Wd.

ae2f5851-dd59-46b3-8557-70018a05930e.name: Royal Privilege
ae2f5851-dd59-46b3-8557-70018a05930e.description: Whenever this character would suffer Dmg, you may have a friendly Goblin within 4" and LoS suffer all that Dmg instead.

02c732d3-30ba-45d8-a13b-b23ca293cf96.name: Sceptre of Almighty Power
02c732d3-30ba-45d8-a13b-b23ca293cf96.description: If this character deals Slicing Melee dmg, reduce the Dmg dealt to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

a14896c6-fa2a-448d-8660-8e87211bc0b3.name: Spirit Link
a14896c6-fa2a-448d-8660-8e87211bc0b3.description: During the Replenish Step, this character gains +1 energy for each friendly slain character.

2d6a18bd-122d-4114-b5af-7433f26ebc2d.name: Undying
2d6a18bd-122d-4114-b5af-7433f26ebc2d.description: Each time this character would be slain, instead restore all Wds. Then, if this character was in possession of any Moonstones, it drops one of them as if it were slain.

5890bd08-5d35-4a44-b76d-b86e01ceb243.name: Inheritance Tax
5890bd08-5d35-4a44-b76d-b86e01ceb243.description: When a friendly Goblin character within 4" and LoS is slain, you may place one Moonstone the character was in possession of in base contact with this model at depth value of '1'.

bf7e3ae1-c7c4-4485-86c2-f70b2c7ca708.name: Friskal Stimulus
bf7e3ae1-c7c4-4485-86c2-f70b2c7ca708.description: When this character is involved in a round of melee it gains +X Melee Stat and reduces all Melee Dmg suffered by -X, where X is the number of Moonstones the enemy character is in possession of.

d3dbb437-f729-43da-a905-d4c361f1c107.name: I Want My Nanny!
d3dbb437-f729-43da-a905-d4c361f1c107.description: When an enemy character declares this model as a target of an action, you may interupt the action to move this model 2" directly towards a friendly Nanny. If you do, the enemy must complete the action if possible and may not choose a new target.

c2e31234-c73d-43b0-8bc8-7b085eb571e9.name: Stinger
c2e31234-c73d-43b0-8bc8-7b085eb571e9.description: If this character deals Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

ab7bc7d1-12de-4803-99fc-ef80aab87a42.name: Vicious
ab7bc7d1-12de-4803-99fc-ef80aab87a42.description: Each time this model causes one or more Wds to an enemy, it gains 1 energy. (Max - 3 times per turn.).

64d1feb3-188d-4e63-9a8f-c946ddfcb32f.name: Short 'n Stabby
64d1feb3-188d-4e63-9a8f-c946ddfcb32f.description: If this character deals Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

fcba2091-6c23-454d-b1ec-8343424a7444.name: Lard Lover
fcba2091-6c23-454d-b1ec-8343424a7444.description: This character gains +2 Melee stat if there is a Giant within 4".

add47010-a683-49fc-a6b8-047927e51f47.name: Guiding Lantern
add47010-a683-49fc-a6b8-047927e51f47.description: When a friendly model enters play via Reanimate or Reanimate Jobie it may be placed in base contact with this model instead of the originator.

62d05d1b-f5cb-4601-bb3c-7db4142c4b9b.name: Spade
62d05d1b-f5cb-4601-bb3c-7db4142c4b9b.description: If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

ff734c14-7d9a-44f7-a198-365619895c24.name: Gravedigger
ff734c14-7d9a-44f7-a198-365619895c24.description: The first time each turn this character performs a Harvest action, you may reduce the depth value by 2, instead of 1.

ed481ad6-e90b-4567-a820-228d81a13db7.name: Keep 'em Fresh
ed481ad6-e90b-4567-a820-228d81a13db7.description: When this model or a friendly Risen model enters play via Reanimate, it may restore 2 Wds. Other friendly models entering play via Reanimate may restore 1 Wd.

961d2a2e-6b77-4e04-91bf-01592eaff50b.name: Intrusion
961d2a2e-6b77-4e04-91bf-01592eaff50b.description: After dice are rolled to determine who activates first, this model may spend 1 energy to reroll its die.

177b5176-6064-41f8-8785-272d1706ef7c.name: Erosion
177b5176-6064-41f8-8785-272d1706ef7c.description: Enemies within 4" suffer -1 Melee Stat when declaring a Melee Attack action or -2 Melee Stat if targeting this character with a Melee Attack action.

fb3a0525-d426-425d-8b49-b038fed635d6.name: Cavalry Mace
fb3a0525-d426-425d-8b49-b038fed635d6.description: If this character deals Slicing Melee Dmg, reduce the Dmg to ∅. If this character deals Impact Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

ae595ad1-90eb-42d3-b610-20cbb431c4cc.name: Concealed Armour
ae595ad1-90eb-42d3-b610-20cbb431c4cc.description: If this character suffers Piercing Dmg, reduce the Dmg suffered by -1.

b8683d52-ba0e-44b3-aad8-7d0f7daa7ae5.name: Javelin
b8683d52-ba0e-44b3-aad8-7d0f7daa7ae5.description: If this character deals Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2.

7bfaf3ab-5530-4e8a-8546-bc4a762969c1.name: Rending Claws
7bfaf3ab-5530-4e8a-8546-bc4a762969c1.description: If this character deals Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1. Melee Dmg from this character counts as Magical instead of the listed type.

21f312d8-b714-4016-9fd5-53ced34290ab.name: Ancestral Sword
21f312d8-b714-4016-9fd5-53ced34290ab.description: If this character deals Slicing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +2. If this character deals Piercing Melee Dmg, increase the Dmg dealt by +1.

da8f3bbc-529f-4c50-929c-895a9d99eb0a.name: Link to the Present
da8f3bbc-529f-4c50-929c-895a9d99eb0a.description: If a friendly Antonia, Noonday Witch was taken in this troupe at the start of the game then this character gains +1 energy during each Replenish Step.

da494bbf-b3f3-4822-97eb-efcf079b925e.name: Mesmerising
da494bbf-b3f3-4822-97eb-efcf079b925e.description: Enemy models engaged by this character must discard 1 energy before they can declare a Jog, Step or Reaction Step.

e1996e84-d953-4e94-98f0-023d718b1fe4.name: Overclock
e1996e84-d953-4e94-98f0-023d718b1fe4.description: Target other friendly Machine suffers 1 Wd, then may take any action available to them which would normally have an energy cost of (2). (You may only target each character once per turn.).

a4b5c6d7-e8f9-4012-a4b5-c6d7e8f90123.name: Boingy
a4b5c6d7-e8f9-4012-a4b5-c6d7e8f90123.description: Place this model within 2" and LoS. This model cannot take Harvest actions until end of turn.

a5b6c7d8-e9f0-4123-a5b6-c7d8e9f01234.name: Astrazan Tactics
a5b6c7d8-e9f0-4123-a5b6-c7d8e9f01234.description: This character immediately takes a Melee Attack or Blunderbuss action against an enemy in range, without spending energy. In either case, increase any Dmg dealt by +2, then place this model within 1" of itself and LoS after resolving the attack.

a6b7c8d9-e0f1-4234-a6b7-c8d9e0f12345.name: Reload [Blunderbuss]
a6b7c8d9-e0f1-4234-a6b7-c8d9e0f12345.description: The named ability can be used again. (This ability cannot be used while this model is engaged.).

67ad28a7-c67e-4780-9193-8c80ffb1be7a.name: Ice in the Veins
67ad28a7-c67e-4780-9193-8c80ffb1be7a.description: Flip an Arcane Card. If the card is blue, restore X+1 Wds.

14bc1892-81be-47c2-8e2b-0e38ea772569.name: Remove Necklace
14bc1892-81be-47c2-8e2b-0e38ea772569.description: This character gains +4 energy. Then it is Removed from Play and replaced by Striga Anya. Striga Anya gains energy and suffers Wds equal to those already on this character along with all Moonstones this character is carrying and any stat modifications or abilities it has gained. Continue Anya Bartol's activation with Striga Anya; it may not Jog if Anya Bartol already did this turn.

ba9b51f9-3271-45fd-9565-833740c7fe96.name: Rallying Cry
ba9b51f9-3271-45fd-9565-833740c7fe96.description: Energy on other friendly Humans within the pulse is restored up to the number of blue dots currently remaining on their health bar.

fba78738-99ae-4b8a-9b69-0a224d49b922.name: Reload [Shoot Pistol]
fba78738-99ae-4b8a-9b69-0a224d49b922.description: The named ability can be used again. (This ability cannot be used while this model is engaged.).

c4c1530f-eddb-4fcc-86cd-d19c849f767a.name: Foul Gases
c4c1530f-eddb-4fcc-86cd-d19c849f767a.description: All models within the pulse suffer 2 Magical Dmg.

ad9024c2-964a-40f5-9980-a31eeb4a972d.name: Stand Back!
ad9024c2-964a-40f5-9980-a31eeb4a972d.description: All other models within the pulse move 1" directly away.

b8728ecc-76c6-4865-b106-3b38933bd835.name: Faerie Tricks
b8728ecc-76c6-4865-b106-3b38933bd835.description: Swap places with target friendly Rogue.

b2575808-72b1-42e4-b008-9cd4b5cd6d77.name: Ramming Speed
b2575808-72b1-42e4-b008-9cd4b5cd6d77.description: Move this model 6" directly towards target enemy model. If base contact is made with the target, flip an arcane card. The target suffers X+1 Impact Dmg then is moved X" directly away, where X is the value of the flipped card.
b2575808-72b1-42e4-b008-9cd4b5cd6d77.catastrophe: The target model suffers no damage and may move up to 3".

6f5274f7-1985-467f-8b01-2be69b247ba3.name: Bear Charge
6f5274f7-1985-467f-8b01-2be69b247ba3.description: Move this model 3" directly towards target enemy model. The target cannot play Signature Moves until end of this character's activation.

76e44f9d-6834-4831-8739-8392298a1846.name: Suckerpunch
76e44f9d-6834-4831-8739-8392298a1846.description: Target Goblin's next Melee Attack this turn deals +2 Dmg.

cd98926e-ca8a-49a3-a449-5c1e90900bb1.name: A Noble Challenge
cd98926e-ca8a-49a3-a449-5c1e90900bb1.description: This character makes a Melee Attack action with +3 Melee Stat against target enemy character. If the target of this action is a Noble reduce Dmg suffered by this character to ∅ for the duration of the action.

cd7266d3-fe30-4f14-8cd0-12735f462980.name: Reload [Faerie Fire Pistol]
cd7266d3-fe30-4f14-8cd0-12735f462980.description: The named ability can be used again. (This ability cannot be used while this model is engaged.).

df6ac2e4-3112-49d8-ae46-0e5db1ce784c.name: Plant the Placard
df6ac2e4-3112-49d8-ae46-0e5db1ce784c.description: Move all other friendly characters within the pulse up to 1". This character cannot take Jog or Step actions, or make a Reaction Step until end of turn.

b1a5a949-4ebc-41b6-a61f-8765217eb491.name: Epic Ballads of Giant Heros!
b1a5a949-4ebc-41b6-a61f-8765217eb491.description: Other Giants within the pulse gain +1 energy.

507453bf-51f7-4566-80ff-70e268723677.name: Clumsy Cluts
507453bf-51f7-4566-80ff-70e268723677.description: Target gains Weakling until end of turn.

453b27f9-980b-4792-9389-c8d907139c05.name: Stocked to the Gills
453b27f9-980b-4792-9389-c8d907139c05.description: Target Pirate with the Reload [...] ability may immediately use the Reload [...] ability without spending energy.

fa85fd9c-913b-429b-a07a-4acb20105091.name: Rouse
fa85fd9c-913b-429b-a07a-4acb20105091.description: Target Faun or Animal restores 1 Wd and gains +2 energy.

a6a270f3-b306-4d36-82f9-a928646f5d3e.name: Robbery
a6a270f3-b306-4d36-82f9-a928646f5d3e.description: Target model with less Wds remaining than this character, loses possession of one Moonstone and this character gains possession of that Moonstone.

bc2fac51-42cd-4e6f-a1ca-ed8707a79f85.name: Old Pirate Curse
bc2fac51-42cd-4e6f-a1ca-ed8707a79f85.description: Target without The Black Spot gains [The Black Spot: Enemy Pirates gain +1 Arcane Stat when targeting this character with an action. This character suffers 1 Wd during the Discard Step], until end of game. Then other enemies with The Black Spot lose it.

b5a8180b-4ddb-4eb8-9ee9-8865b2688722.name: Victimise
b5a8180b-4ddb-4eb8-9ee9-8865b2688722.description: Target gets +2 Evade Stat until end of turn.

0473966d-2f55-4d77-816a-6b5f38de3864.name: Look out!
0473966d-2f55-4d77-816a-6b5f38de3864.description: Target friendly character's Evade stat is reduced by -1 until end of turn.

ab1af891-1c5f-42a7-9935-baa8bfb6c1b9.name: Meddle with Fate
ab1af891-1c5f-42a7-9935-baa8bfb6c1b9.description: Draw 3 cards from the Arcane Deck for each Spirit in play. You may choose up to 3 of the cards to remove from the deck and place face down besides this character card. For each card removed this character suffers 2 Wds, then shuffle the remaining cards into the deck. If this character is slain, return all removed cards to the deck and shuffle.

16f936bb-a2b2-4ba1-80a3-5d66629dd79c.name: Chaaarge!!
16f936bb-a2b2-4ba1-80a3-5d66629dd79c.description: Move this model 4" directly towards target enemy model. If this character's next action this turn is a Melee Attack against the same target it deals +2 Dmg.

3df95f4f-0109-48e5-8d9d-121e05e65847.name: Fleeting Presence
3df95f4f-0109-48e5-8d9d-121e05e65847.description: This action may only be used whilst this model is active and may not be removed from this card by any abilities. This model suffers 2 Wds. Then, if this character wasn't slain, it may immediately take an action available to it costing (1) or (2) energy without spending energy.

f1562a96-1e0c-4b4f-8a21-21a2b47d61c8.name: Hit
f1562a96-1e0c-4b4f-8a21-21a2b47d61c8.description: This character's next Melee Attack this turn deals +2 Dmg.

1ff80c9a-f8a3-4948-9908-c6004670ba5a.name: My Hero
1ff80c9a-f8a3-4948-9908-c6004670ba5a.description: Target Soldier gains 1 energy or, target Noble gains 2 energy.

d52ec0e0-ab93-45b7-abf9-16eacefda05e.name: Two Goblins Walk into a Tavern
d52ec0e0-ab93-45b7-abf9-16eacefda05e.description: Two other target Goblins each gain +1 energy and +2 Evade stat until end of turn. You must choose two different targets.

819ba912-0064-41b7-b5c3-cefea405907c.name: Reload [Shoot Musket]
819ba912-0064-41b7-b5c3-cefea405907c.description: The named ability can be used again. (This ability cannot be used while this model is engaged.).

829d7453-d05b-4ee9-a163-874ebb727142.name: Take Aim
829d7453-d05b-4ee9-a163-874ebb727142.description: Increase this character's Arcane stat by +1 until end of turn.

0fff809c-5f1c-48d1-895f-1721e8acfc17.name: Intimidate
0fff809c-5f1c-48d1-895f-1721e8acfc17.description: Target Human or Goblin suffers -2 Arcane stat and gains [Predictable Combatant: During a round of combat, before each player selects their combat card, you must reveal your hand to your opponent.] until end of turn.

5c7b96a5-7e8a-46e9-8d52-b3e52eca6822.name: Natural Order
5c7b96a5-7e8a-46e9-8d52-b3e52eca6822.description: All models within the pulse suffer 1 Wd for each energy token they have over 3.

44beb7fd-5e2d-41aa-a05e-201c38a68a70.name: Reload [Bolt Thrower]
44beb7fd-5e2d-41aa-a05e-201c38a68a70.description: The named ability can be used again.

8ba42f65-9b36-400e-a2d0-caebcc6709e2.name: Sticky Tongue
8ba42f65-9b36-400e-a2d0-caebcc6709e2.description: Target with Evade Stat -1 or lower, suffers 1 Impact Dmg and is moved 4" directly towards this model.

325a5451-ef1d-4718-b7de-75cdec9277f6.name: Ooga-booga!
325a5451-ef1d-4718-b7de-75cdec9277f6.description: Move target enemy Goblin 2" directly away.

25729e91-28b3-46a3-bd2d-c5382915dcb8.name: Forgetfulness
25729e91-28b3-46a3-bd2d-c5382915dcb8.description: Remove one Arcane or Active Ability from target character until the end of the turn.

9364c458-8886-4a7f-954e-56416953f8ac.name: Drain Life
9364c458-8886-4a7f-954e-56416953f8ac.description: Target other friendly Spirit or Risen is slain. The next time this character uses Reanimate this turn, reduce its energy cost to (0) and gain +2 Arcane Stat for the duration of the action.

3777ea04-2b6c-4379-8454-eccc89543e1f.name: Necrotic Salve
3777ea04-2b6c-4379-8454-eccc89543e1f.description: Target friendly character restores 1 Wd. If the target is a Noble and at least one friendly model was slain this turn, the target also gains +1 energy.

066f5717-6c23-4b6c-93dd-de3032ce8e8e.name: Wyrm Hole
066f5717-6c23-4b6c-93dd-de3032ce8e8e.description: This model must be in base contact with an item of Obstacle terrain to use this ability. Lose possession of any Moonstones this character is in possession of (place them in base contact with a depth value of 1), then place this model in base contact with any item of Obstacle terrain on the board.

ed491262-f1e5-4403-bd7f-4a1f15471a06.name: Scry
ed491262-f1e5-4403-bd7f-4a1f15471a06.description: Draw the top card of the Arcane Deck; look then place it face down besides this character card. At any point you can add the card to your Arcane or Arcane Resist Hand. If you do then at the end of the action, or if this character is slain, shuffle the card back into the Arcane Deck.

cca7703d-7338-481c-88bd-f032f76b2248.name: Passage of the Seasons
cca7703d-7338-481c-88bd-f032f76b2248.description: Place this model within target Wooded Patch. This ability may only be used if this model is within a Wooded Patch.

4dc005bf-6193-4a90-8ee2-f550932631f6.name: Furious Charge
4dc005bf-6193-4a90-8ee2-f550932631f6.description: Move this model 3" directly towards target enemy model. If this character's next action this turn is a Melee Attack against the same target then it deals +1 Dmg.

e02278b5-5223-4f1c-bb9b-6fd9a8045321.name: Perplex
e02278b5-5223-4f1c-bb9b-6fd9a8045321.description: Target loses 1 energy. Then another friendly Faerie within 6" of the target gains that much energy.

95508b6c-53af-4803-8af7-ad061034a067.name: Burrowing Claws
95508b6c-53af-4803-8af7-ad061034a067.description: This model gains possession of one Moonstone it is in base contact with regardless of its depth value. This ability cannot be used while this model is engaged.

3c0ab72e-0dbd-466c-8b44-4a2eb8493f01.name: Hop
3c0ab72e-0dbd-466c-8b44-4a2eb8493f01.description: Move this model 4". You may move freely over intervening obstacles and models provided bases do not overlap at the end of the move.

987d2e55-0a62-4d74-bad0-fad86cfe7540.name: Behold my Splashy Fury!
987d2e55-0a62-4d74-bad0-fad86cfe7540.description: Target character suffers 2 Magical Dmg. (This ability may only be used if this model is within a Water Feature.).

a375c6e2-1779-40bc-bd0e-767a319431cb.name: A Cunning Plan
a375c6e2-1779-40bc-bd0e-767a319431cb.description: This model may place one Moonstone it is in possession of, within 2" of itself at depth value of '1'. Then it is immediately slain.

985d787d-c74b-4b6d-82f8-83a894cfaa6b.name: That's Mine, This is Mine
985d787d-c74b-4b6d-82f8-83a894cfaa6b.description: This model gains possession of one Moonstone it is in base contact with, regardless of its depth value or enemy engagements.

6a962c79-3735-409a-ab14-bc6224bc61db.name: Paroxysm
6a962c79-3735-409a-ab14-bc6224bc61db.description: All other models within 3" suffer 4 Magical Dmg then are moved 3" directly away.

a2bf767c-2f79-4193-9777-e244d40acd20.name: Shower of Gold
a2bf767c-2f79-4193-9777-e244d40acd20.description: Target a single point on the board within 6" and LoS of this model. All other models within 4" of the chosen spot move 2" directly towards that point. The Kaufman player chooses the order of the moves.

1c7b8614-8cf4-41e3-b241-1c559124983e.name: Money Bag
1c7b8614-8cf4-41e3-b241-1c559124983e.description: Place a 30mm diameter Bag of Gold token within 6" and LoS of this model. The token remains in play but is immediately removed if any model is in base contact with it. Whenever another model takes a Jog or Step action while within 6" and LoS of a Bag of Gold token, it may not end the move further from the nearest Bag of Gold token than it began.

40b204c9-c845-4639-825b-025598b1dcc4.name: Black Comedy
40b204c9-c845-4639-825b-025598b1dcc4.description: Target other friendly character suffers 2 Wds and gains +1 energy.

8566d821-f100-433c-95ef-ef67aa263abc.name: Roley-Poley
8566d821-f100-433c-95ef-ef67aa263abc.description: Move 2" then reduce this character's Evade Stat by -2 until end of turn.

939d45a6-2212-4085-972c-c807c68b8c46.name: Juggling Fate
939d45a6-2212-4085-972c-c807c68b8c46.description: Gain +2 energy. Draw the top 3 cards of the Arcane Deck, look then place them face down: one on the top of the deck, one on the bottom of the deck and one besides this character card. At any point you can add the removed card to your Arcane or Arcane Resist Hand. If you do then at the end of the action, or if this character is slain, shuffle the card back into the Arcane Deck.

411032e8-f0d0-4440-b847-267b78bcbc7f.name: Hold my Beer
411032e8-f0d0-4440-b847-267b78bcbc7f.description: All characters within the Pulse suffer 1 Catastrophe printed on their card. The Klaus player chooses the catastrophe if a character has several, the targets if required and the order in which all effects occur.

da351b30-5345-4955-9d8f-ef02815fad64.name: Righteous Fury
da351b30-5345-4955-9d8f-ef02815fad64.description: This character gains +3 energy, +1 Melee Stat, +1 Arcane Stat and +1 to Melee Dmg until end of turn.

ff4ba301-6d13-460d-9d58-4d842b2e9379.name: Mother's Wrath
ff4ba301-6d13-460d-9d58-4d842b2e9379.description: This action can only be taken if engaged by an enemy. Other friendly Gnomes within the pulse gain 1 energy. Enemy models within the pulse suffer 2 Wds.

46107ed3-8b05-4177-8eeb-55db9724a562.name: Mother's Love
46107ed3-8b05-4177-8eeb-55db9724a562.description: Move 2" directly towards target Gnome, then the target moves 2" directly towards this model and restores 2 Wds.

7c979fd4-10b4-47f0-aeb4-89a7dd99a5fe.name: Reclaim Life
7c979fd4-10b4-47f0-aeb4-89a7dd99a5fe.description: Target friendly character suffers 2 Wds or, if at least one friendly model was slain or reduced to 0 Wds this turn, it may restore 2 Wds instead.

8ee75da3-e10e-44b7-9701-cff22baba46b.name: Shove
8ee75da3-e10e-44b7-9701-cff22baba46b.description: Move target other model 2" directly away.

11214c25-f67b-4dda-b32e-dbd327f1cb43.name: Goblin Jazz Funk Solo
11214c25-f67b-4dda-b32e-dbd327f1cb43.description: All other models within the pulse move 1" directly away.

789f7f5e-1f64-4ae5-9465-8e80d64e655d.name: Sneaking
789f7f5e-1f64-4ae5-9465-8e80d64e655d.description: This character gets -2 Evade Stat until end of turn.

a23067ce-c53c-41cb-ad83-30d851c76bf7.name: Squeaking
a23067ce-c53c-41cb-ad83-30d851c76bf7.description: Move target enemy 1". Reaction Steps cannot be declared in response to this action.

83fd836a-4dce-41d9-99da-43e450d70c3e.name: Sewer Rat
83fd836a-4dce-41d9-99da-43e450d70c3e.description: You may only play this ability if Muridae is inside a building. This character is Removed From Play. At the start of the next Replenish Step, return this character to play inside any building.

6ce04c2a-fb75-460c-82a3-7e5406546285.name: Fortunate
6ce04c2a-fb75-460c-82a3-7e5406546285.description: Look at the top 3 cards of the Arcane Deck. Put any number on the top of the deck in any order and put the remainder on the bottom of the deck in any order.

ac7d04ef-fd21-43de-be00-cc36f9d0569a.name: X Marks The Spot
ac7d04ef-fd21-43de-be00-cc36f9d0569a.description: Target Moonstone or enemy in possession of a Moonstone. All friendly Pirates within 4" of the target move 1" directly towards it.

c59ee9d2-78f4-45d9-8304-43f73dab1be9.name: He Called me Names!
c59ee9d2-78f4-45d9-8304-43f73dab1be9.description: Target character suffers -1 Arcane Stat or -1 Melee Stat until end of turn.

2543bcc8-3a90-4be5-a167-49a66977c7a4.name: Stand to Attention!
2543bcc8-3a90-4be5-a167-49a66977c7a4.description: Target other friendly Goblin gains +1 energy. If the target is a Soldier it may also move 2".

78838cbe-2ed2-4b07-b2bf-4473bee9177d.name: Foresight
78838cbe-2ed2-4b07-b2bf-4473bee9177d.description: Target Human gains +2 Arcane stat until end of turn.

b7a1672d-d50a-4bca-80ea-0b7f7ccc00d6.name: Reload [Shoot Crossbow]
b7a1672d-d50a-4bca-80ea-0b7f7ccc00d6.description: The named ability can be used again. (This ability cannot be used while this model is engaged.).

03ebfe40-8d77-422d-b866-0664b2835da2.name: Brothers in Arms
03ebfe40-8d77-422d-b866-0664b2835da2.description: Target other friendly Militia gains +1 Arcane stat and +2 Melee stat until end of turn. Then, the target may discard 1 energy to give this character +1 Arcane stat and +2 Melee stat until end of turn. (You may only target each character once per turn.).

89f2621f-0841-4316-b69f-f97c6e8af52a.name: Conductor
89f2621f-0841-4316-b69f-f97c6e8af52a.description: Target friendly Psychopomp immediately takes any action available to them irrespective of energy cost, excluding Jog. Increase the Psychopomp's Melee & Arcane Stat by +1 for each friendly Psychopomp in play for the duration of the action.

c2926257-4eaf-4a70-a219-39704952a9a9.name: Summon an Encore!
c2926257-4eaf-4a70-a219-39704952a9a9.description: This action cannot bring a character into play if it is already in play. Place a new friendly Psychopomp, which was slain earlier this turn, in base contact with this model.

5f515e9e-ebd0-423b-b952-2567e741697e.name: Psychopomp Parade
5f515e9e-ebd0-423b-b952-2567e741697e.description: Flip an Arcane Card then move all friendly Psychopomps within the pulse up to X", where X is the value of the card.
5f515e9e-ebd0-423b-b952-2567e741697e.catastrophe: The player to the left may move this model 2".

aeb5eec6-c40b-4b85-ad78-956d916bfeaf.name: Bawdy Jokes
aeb5eec6-c40b-4b85-ad78-956d916bfeaf.description: All Goblins within the pulse are moved 1" directly towards this model. Then, all other Goblins within 1" gain +1 energy.

126d25af-a2a2-4004-97c6-ef591cb75be9.name: Merfolk Magic
126d25af-a2a2-4004-97c6-ef591cb75be9.description: Place this model within 2" and LoS. This model cannot take Harvest actions until end of turn.

e5aa1775-d54e-483a-a396-f3fe93f09435.name: Goblin Mischief
e5aa1775-d54e-483a-a396-f3fe93f09435.description: Deal an Arcane Card to each Goblin within the Pulse. .

65b2901f-1cd7-440a-b68f-25ed57fab6fa.name: Mind Control
65b2901f-1cd7-440a-b68f-25ed57fab6fa.description: Target model immediately takes any action available to them that would normally have an energy cost of (1). This action is controlled by you even if the target is an enemy (they count as a friendly model for the duration of the action).

e7407f16-492f-45b1-82cf-7b89bb009aa3.name: Yell Out Commands
e7407f16-492f-45b1-82cf-7b89bb009aa3.description: Move target friendly non-Noble 1". If the target is a friendly Soldier move it 2" instead. (You may only target each character once per turn.).

9e002c16-373d-4af8-b1dd-7bbba3fd7c8b.name: Utter Swine
9e002c16-373d-4af8-b1dd-7bbba3fd7c8b.description: You may have another friendly model within 6" suffer 2 Wds. If they do then target enemy loses one Arcane Ability of your choice until end of turn.

26d34fab-a92c-427a-aa4b-afd6a1c7d6f9.name: He Pushed Me!
26d34fab-a92c-427a-aa4b-afd6a1c7d6f9.description: Move target other model 1" directly away.

b9ae9e3c-bb4c-481e-add9-bf0405e58368.name: Replace Necklace
b9ae9e3c-bb4c-481e-add9-bf0405e58368.description: This character gains +1 energy. Then it is Removed from Play and replaced by Anya Bartol. Anya Bartol gains energy and suffers Wds equal to those already on this character along with all Moonstones it's carrying and any stat modifications or abilities it has gained. Continue Striga Anya's activation with Anya Bartol; she may not Jog if Striga Anya already did this turn.

7542a890-94df-464a-97c0-390862b31486.name: Energy Syphon
7542a890-94df-464a-97c0-390862b31486.description: Target a friendly model. Flip an Arcane card and redistribute up to X energy from that model to any combination of models within 8", where X is the value on the card.
7542a890-94df-464a-97c0-390862b31486.catastrophe: The target loses 2 energy and this character suffers 2 Wds.

6d1819b8-9c77-470e-ac85-efeef2c82b82.name: Eat Me!
6d1819b8-9c77-470e-ac85-efeef2c82b82.description: Target friendly character restores 2 Wds then this model suffers 1 Wd.

97697c46-6438-44be-813c-695b7349dfc7.name: Leave to Rise until Doubled in Size
97697c46-6438-44be-813c-695b7349dfc7.description: This character restores 1 Wd. This character cannot take actions until end of turn.

1f936e59-79bf-4a44-9e92-c43d76a3294e.name: Gimme!!
1f936e59-79bf-4a44-9e92-c43d76a3294e.description: Gain possession of one Moonstone carried by target friendly Goblin.

113c660d-96c5-47d8-9ca0-0cd6f681e57a.name: Rule the Roost
113c660d-96c5-47d8-9ca0-0cd6f681e57a.description: Target Goblin suffers 2 Wds, gains 2 energy and activates immediately after this character's activation ends. If the target has already activated, then this is a bonus activation, otherwise this counts as the target's activation for the turn.

92cc939b-6979-4bf4-b0bb-a9c12934c521.name: Visions of the Future
92cc939b-6979-4bf4-b0bb-a9c12934c521.description: Target other friendly character immediately suffers one Catastrophe printed on their card. If it requires a target, you may choose any target that meets the ability's requirements.

3a507636-af10-42d7-89ff-6b46aac266a2.name: Rebate
3a507636-af10-42d7-89ff-6b46aac266a2.description: Target other character restores X+2 Wds or moves X+2" directly towards this character, where X is the number of Moonstones the target is in possession of. (For characters without Moonstones X is 0).

53c5caae-53e5-4d6d-9c93-02c70c762f32.name: Income Tax
53c5caae-53e5-4d6d-9c93-02c70c762f32.description: Target enemy character in possession of at least one Moonstone cannot take the Jog or Step Action or take Reaction Steps until end of turn. The enemy character may immediately spend X energy to cancel this effect, where X is the number of Moonstones they are in possession of. If they do, this character gains that much energy.

e8dcceb2-c455-4c17-a0a4-b783ca20bc56.name: Antagonise
e8dcceb2-c455-4c17-a0a4-b783ca20bc56.description: Target gains +1 Melee Stat and +1 Evade Stat until end of turn.

abf216b8-f891-44d2-a9ad-75aeacfebff4.name: Out of Reach
abf216b8-f891-44d2-a9ad-75aeacfebff4.description: This character cannot be targeted by a Melee Attack action and does not benefit from cover until end of turn.

e0bbebab-d0e5-44fa-b617-36589cefb24d.name: Fear
e0bbebab-d0e5-44fa-b617-36589cefb24d.description: Target other character loses 1 energy then a friendly model within 4" of this character gains that much energy.

e35ca5fe-7200-4958-813f-a6b20c4e9f2a.name: Rage
e35ca5fe-7200-4958-813f-a6b20c4e9f2a.description: Target Faerie loses Weakling until end of turn.

03285058-cb5e-4039-9470-12d67a3dda34.name: Lucky
03285058-cb5e-4039-9470-12d67a3dda34.description: Look at the top 5 cards of the Arcane Deck. Put any number on the top of the deck in any order and put the remainder on the bottom of the deck in any order.

arcaneOutcomes.outcomeText: Target suffers X Magical Dmg then loses X energy.
This character suffers 3 Wds.

e1996e84-d953-4e94-98f0-023d718b1fe5.subtext: This ability cannot be used while this model is engaged.
